snippet: The St. Louis Rams’ chief operating officer, Kevin Demoff, confirmed an agreement in principle to trade the No. 2 pick in the coming draft to Washington for three first-round selections.
abstract: St. Louis Rams confirm an agreement in principle to trade the No. 2 pick in the NFL draft to Washington Redskins for three first-round selections.
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Rams’ chief operating officer, Kevin Demoff, confirmed an agreement in principle to trade the No. 2 pick in the coming draft to Washington for three first-round selections.
